Class CliUserInputter

  • java.lang.Object
    • CliUserInputter

  • public class CliUserInputter
extends java.lang.Object
    CliUserInputter Class Utility class to prompt the user for input

        getUserInputInteger() Prompt the user for an integer input If the input is greater than the maxValue, print a notification and prompt again for input

        Returns:

      • getUserInputInteger

        public static int getUserInputInteger(int maxValue,
                                      java.lang.String question)
        getUserInputInteger() Prompt the user for an integer input with the given question. If the input is greater than the maxValue, print a notification and prompt again for input
        Parameters:
        maxValue - int
        question - String
        Returns:
        int

      • getUserInputIntegerRange

        public static int getUserInputIntegerRange(int minValue,
                                           int maxValue,
                                           java.lang.String question)
        getUserInputIntegerRange() Prompt the user for an integer input with the given question. If the input is not within the minValue-maxValue range, print a notification and prompt again for input
        Parameters:
        minValue - int
        maxValue - int
        question - String
        Returns:
        int

      • getUserInputFloat

        public static float getUserInputFloat(java.lang.String question)
        getUserInputFloat() Prompt the user for a float input with the given question. If the input is not valid, display a notification and prompt again
        Parameters:
        question - String
        Returns:
        float

      • getUserInputString

        public static java.lang.String getUserInputString(int maxLength)
        getUserInputString() Prompt the user for a String input. If the input is longer than the maxLength, display a notification and prompt again
        Parameters:
        maxLength - int
        Returns:
        String

      • getUserInputString

        public static java.lang.String getUserInputString(int maxLength,
                                                  java.lang.String question)
        getUserInputString() Prompt the user for a String input using the given question. If the input is longer than the maxLength, display a notification and prompt again
        Parameters:
        maxLength - int
        question - String
        Returns:
        String

      • getUserInputYN

        public static java.lang.String getUserInputYN()
        getUserInputYN() Prompt the user for a Y or N input. If the input is not Y, y, N or n, display a notification and prompt again
        Returns:
        String

      • getUserInputYN

        public static java.lang.String getUserInputYN(java.lang.String question)
        getUserInputYN() Prompt the user for a Y or N input using the given question. If the input is not Y, y, N or n, display a notification and prompt again
        Parameters:
        question - String
        Returns:
        String
